subject: Re: Link to order #SSN4250
description_text:
Hello, do you have any news about the shipping of the pre order?

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Axel S,  ​The HS Pro is expected to be shipped between December 20 and 22.

Hello.

Normaly it supposed to be around the 15th of december...
I Hope it will be really shipped around the 20th.

Thanks for your answer.
Best regards

Le sam. 20 déc. 2025, 14:24, service@simsonn.com

Hi Axel S,  Yes, we are also working on confirming this as quickly as possible. Occasionally, some components may have issues that require temporary adjustments and inspections, which can cause slight delays in shipping. Thank you for your understanding.

Hello,

Finaly just receive m'y HS pro shifter.
But the device is not detected by simsonn manager...
I Can sée the device on my computer, can see it in game.
But simsonn dont detect the device si i cant configure it...

Maybe simsonn manager need an update ?

Cant use the shifter for the moment, its so disapointing...

Thanks for your answer.

Le dim. 21 déc. 2025, 03:30, service@simsonn.com

To add some informations, in a game, only the input of sequential mode is
detected, all the other gear doesn't work.

Hope a Quick answer because in fact i cant use this product...

---------- Forwarded message ---------
De : Axel S <axl.soubrier@gmail.com>
Date: mar. 6 janv. 2026, 08:04
Subject: Re: Re: Link to order #SSN4250
To: SIMSONN

Hi Axel S,  Please uninstall SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.2 from your computer first, then download and install SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.3 from our official website.  SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 adds full support for HS Pro 2-in-1 shifter configuration and calibration. Please use this version to complete the setup and calibration.   https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
